data.message:
White people mad😂. A WHITE boy from DETROIT. A person that struggled and was  raised in the hood. You really think he was gonna hold back this reality we live in.  

You must be stupid...oh wait.  MAGA 

👍😭 take your political butthurt asses to bed either way Eminem is a fucking legend.  

#fuckTRUMP  oppression  a bitch huh.You  mad ass🤗 fuck yall.

replies.message: Man Stfu cause you the same black fans that gets mad when he wins a award or gets called the goat
Go away 👍😊
I'm white, I'm not mad.
What he needs to be mad about is all the democrats who fucked up Detroit and every other major city, Democrats Republicans Trump all the fucking same
Fuck you your complexion is as light as mine. You are just a sensitive pussy who is butthurt about "trumps mean words". Grow a fucking pair and stop being a snowflake little bitch.
LOVE THIS!  Artists are also citizens of this country and why shouldn't they voice their opinion?  What is happening in this country affects everyone.
You see how vague Trump supporters are.. it all makes sense .
Oh a look another black that acts like a victim. So oppressed! America is so damn racist having a black president for over 8 consecutive years
Y'all butthurt over my post like i really give a fuck about your opinion 😄😍
Then why did you write a comment about it specifically
Because i can . Just like you can too.
That doesn’t make any sense. You don’t give a fuck, yet you also give a fuck. What?
Im a supporter for minorities , refugees, lgbtq community. ALL people.  You want to be the one to single us out and categorize us. Then you expect us to back down.  No way brother.
But this comment singles out Trump supporters specifically, you’re doing the exact thing that upsets you.
You need to attempt to try to understand what I'm saying because what I'm saying is you have a freedom of speech Just as I do you can say what you want but that does not mean I have to agree with you
You're right.  Two wrongs doesn't make it right.  But I'll voice my thoughts just as the other people are doing so on my thread.
Timara Brioone Which is totally fine but you’re assuming I am against minorities which I am not. Considering that I will be an immigrant myself.

Just because I am a Conservative doesn’t mean I oppress other people in fact I help other people. You wouldn’t like it if someone generalized all black people as gangsta rappers so why generalize all trump supporters as anti-lgbtq or anti-minority?
if you look at the big picture babes majority are . 🙆
Im getting picked on because of my views.  But how come i gotta be a bitch and black and this and that
Timara Brioone Your initial post sets a tone. I don’t hate you for being black at all.
Timara Brioone That's a question you need to answer for yourself. Just sayin......
Wow you're articulate aren't you?
We're butt hurt or are you cause that trash bitch Hillary lost to a nobody like Trump. Your the butt hurt cry babies not Republicans
Damn straight!
